name: Domination
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Time
milestones: Have highest score after max turns
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Project Tempus
victoryScreenHeader:
Adopt Project Tempus and
build the Time Machine to win!
victoryString: It's been a long ten years, but for everyone it's been a matter of weeks. We've erased all our enemies from our timeline, and we've achieved the future we dreamed of.
defeatString: From now on, we are in a complete dystopia. Our government says they have achieved the 'highest good' by creating the world's only time machine. But for us, this is how life was from the beginning.
